trades.market: Seattle wins vs San Francisco - NFL Divisional Round
trades.thesis: SF missing 3 All-Pro players (Bosa season-ending ACL, Warner ruled out ankle, Kittle season-ending Achilles). Short week for SF vs 13-day rest for Seattle. Historical 5-10 record for teams in SF's position. Seattle 11-0 as favorites this season. Sportsbook has Seattle -7 / -340 moneyline (~77% implied).

trades.market: Denver wins vs Buffalo - NFL Divisional Round
trades.thesis: Bills lost 2 WRs to ACLs in wild card (Shavers, Davis). Josh Allen dealing with foot/hand/knee injuries. Bills playing at altitude on short week vs rested #1 seed. Denver has record-setting 68-sack defense. Weather favorable (mid-40s) but altitude matters.

trades.market: Chicago wins vs LA Rams - NFL Divisional Round
trades.thesis: Weather: -11 wind chill, 40 mph gusts, possible snow. Heavily favors ground game/defense over passing. Stafford has hand injury. Bears 2-0 ATS as home underdog, 7 comeback wins with <2 min left this season. Bears 8-2 ATS at home vs LA. Sportsbook models have Rams 61-64%, closer to market than my estimate.

GDPNow estimate at 5.3% as of Jan 14. Historical average absolute error is 0.77pp. At 5.3% +/- 1%, range is 4.3% to 6.3%, well above 3.5% threshold. Strong drivers: trade deficit collapse (-40%), AI infrastructure investment, consumer spending. Market seems to be pricing significant skepticism despite GDPNow track record.

legacy_positions.market: USA next to send humans to Moon
legacy_positions.notes: Pre-existing short position. Long-dated (2031). Current price: Yes bid 52, Yes ask 57.

metadata.description: Kalshi prediction market trades with real money. Tracking thesis, confidence, and outcomes for calibration.
metadata.philosophy: Volume over caution, shorter time horizons, variety across conditions. Learn from outcomes.
